AVS DVD Authoring description
	 
Create DVD discs with personalized chapters, menus, titles, music and effects.

AVS DVD Authoring is an easy-to-use disc authoring and burning software that lets you do more with digital media. It has been designed to help you organize your video footage into a professional and good-looking DVD project.

Create DVD discs with personalized menus Enhance them with titles, music and effects. Choose from a set of handy and professionally created presets.

AVS DVD Authoring allows you to burn the project to DVD and share with friends and family.


Here are some key features of "AVS DVD Authoring":
